entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 11.
entry.summary: Clearing. A few flurries over eastern sections early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 11. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
